title: Download Magic Trackpad and Multi-Touch Trackpad Update 1.0

title: Wireless Mouse Software Update 1.0 for Leopard

title: iSight Updater 1.0.3
description: Update features enhanced IIDC compliance, improved auto exposure and auto white balance, and more.
